name: Survivor Space
description:
The darkness is coming!! The silence is covering your spaceship step by step! The silent rooms. Some scary things are inside your spaceship… they are haunting you.

In the adventure of finding new planets, your spaceship was attacked, and some crazy monster was sneak in to kill your team. Hurry up! Find your own asylum, lock the door and do anything you can to survive and kill the devil and horror monster. Let's build the most powerful defense system against creepy reapers or they will hunt you. If nightmare monsters catch you, they will devour you and destroy the system! Be careful! Don't be caught.

HOW TO PLAY
Find your asylum, lock the door and build the defense system
Tap to create, and you just can build things inside your room.
Fight with the devil monster, outlast your life until darkness is gone.
Upgrade your weapon to make them stronger.

EXCLUSIVE FEATURE
Outstanding 3D graphic design
Famous characters with fabulous hero outfits ever
Fun and addictive dynamic gameplay
